package.name: cross-gcc-musl1-amd64
package.unpack:
# exit 0
tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gcc-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 # tar xf ${SRCDIR}/musl-gcc-patches-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz
tar xf ${SRCDIR}/mpfr-3.1.5.tar.bz2 tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gmp-6.1.2.tar.lz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/mpc-1.0.3.tar.gz
mv -v mpc-1.0.3 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpc mv -v gmp-6.1.2 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gmp mv -v mpfr-3.1.5 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpfr
mkdir ${PKGNAME}-build
cd gcc-${PKGVERSION} sed -e '/m64=/s/lib64/lib/' -i.orig gcc/config/i386/t-linux64
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi # crosstools-ia32-musl/i386-linux-musl export CLFS_HOST=$(echo ${MACHTYPE} | sed "s/-[^-]*/-cross/") export CLFS_TARGET=x86_64-linux-musl export CLFS_CPU=k8 $CLFS_TARGET-gcc -print-libgcc-file-name cd ../gcc-build ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure \ --prefix=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl \ --build=${CLFS_HOST} \ --host=${CLFS_HOST} \ --target=${CLFS_TARGET} \ --with-sysroot=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/${CLFS_TARGET} \ --with-newlib \ --without-headers \ --disable-nls \ --disable-shared \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-decimal-float \ --disable-threads \ --disable-libatomic \ --disable-libgomp \ --disable-libmpx \ --disable-libquadmath \ --disable-libssp \ --disable-libvtv \ --disable-libstdcxx \ --disable-libitm \ --disable-libsanitizer \ --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --with-arch=${CLFS_CPU} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then make -j $jobcount else make -j 4 fi
package.install:
#mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux #touch ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-dummy #exit 0
cd ${PKGNAME}-build make install install-gcc install-target-libgcc DESTDIR=${TGTDIR}
